page.title: 01SUMMARY-AUCHINLECK
page.content: Auchinleck is a village with a population of approximately 4400 people.It lies 12 miles S.E. of Kilmarnock on the A76 Trunk Road and is part of Cumnock and Doon Valley District in Strathclyde Region. It is on a main Bus Route and Railway Line from Glasgow to the South (England). Auchinleck lies at the centre of the Ayrshire Coalfield.This once thriving area of the mining industry is now in decline taking with it most of the male employment.With no new industries moving into the area it now has a high level of unemployment (approximately 23%).
